com.unvired.ump.agent

Interface IApplicationSecret

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationSecret, ApplicationSecret

    public interface IApplicationSecret
extends java.io.Serializable
    IApplicationSecret provides a mechanism that allows process agents to read, delete or set an applications secret.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteApplicationSecret(java.lang.String propertyName)
      Deletes an application secret.
      java.lang.String readApplicationSecret(java.lang.String propertyName)
      Reads an application property.
      void storeApplicationSecret(java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.String propertyValue)
      Sets an application secret to the specified value.
